channel.title: Performance-diaries on Paul Rosoman
channel.description: Recent content in Performance-diaries on Paul Rosoman

item.title: New Zealand International Organ Festival - Wellington
item.description: Sunday October 13th St Mary of the Angels 2.00 pm The Zimbelstern Foundation presents organists Michael Stoddart and Paul Rosoman playing music for four hands and four feet by Adolf Hesse, J.C. Bach. Gustav Merkel and Samuel Sebastian Wesley.

item.title: New Zealand International Organ Festival - Auckland
item.description: Sunday October 13th St Patrick’s Cathedral 6.00 pm The Zimbelstern Foundation presents organists Michael Stoddart and Paul Rosoman playing music for four hands and four feet by Adolf Hesse, J.C. Bach. Gustav Merkel and Samuel Sebastian Wesley.
